site.name: Christabel Frimpong
site.headline: AI Consultant for Training, Strategy, and Development
site.intro: I help organizations understand, adopt, and build with AI through clear training, strategic guidance, and practical development support.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am an AI consultant focused on helping businesses and teams make sense of artificial intelligence in a practical and responsible way. My work includes AI training, technical strategy, and development support tailored to real-world needs.

items.name: AI Training & Workshops
items.description: Introductory and advanced training sessions designed to help teams understand AI concepts, tools, and best practices.

items.name: AI Strategy & Consulting
items.description: Strategic guidance on how AI can be applied to business processes, products, and decision-making.

items.name: Development Support
items.description: Technical support and guidance for building and integrating AI-powered features and systems.

items.name: Sample Project
items.description: A proof-of-concept project demonstrating how AI can be used to automate content updates and maintain a web presence.

contact.title: Contact
contact.cta: If you are interested in working together or learning more, feel free to reach out.

availability.note: Availability subject to project scope and timeline.
